title: "‘Reverse engineering’ a more equitable startup ecosystem"
excerpt: "Creating a more equitable business world is something Shruti Gandhi strongly values. As the founder and managing partner of the San Francisco–based VC firm Array Ventures, the Chicago Booth 2012 MBA graduate aims to create more opportunities for entrepreneurs who typically don't fit typical patterns—including women and people of color."
